{"database_schema": ""Description for enum type: Network"
enum Network {
  "Represents the Arbitrum One network"
  ARBITRUM_ONE
  "Represents the Arweave Mainnet network"
  ARWEAVE_MAINNET
  "Represents the Aurora network"
  AURORA
  "Represents the Avalanche network"
  AVALANCHE
  "Represents the Boba network"
  BOBA
  "Represents the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) network"
  BSC
  "Represents the Celo network"
  CELO
  "Represents the Cosmos network"
  COSMOS
  "Represents the Cronos network"
  CRONOS
  "Represents the Ethereum Mainnet"
  MAINNET
  "Represents the Fantom network"
  FANTOM
  "Represents the Fuse network"
  FUSE
  "Represents the Harmony network"
  HARMONY
  "Represents the Juno network"
  JUNO
  "Represents the Moonbeam network"
  MOONBEAM
  "Represents the Moonriver network"
  MOONRIVER
  "Represents the NEAR Mainnet network"
  NEAR_MAINNET
  "Represents the Optimism network"
  OPTIMISM
  "Represents the Osmosis network"
  OSMOSIS
  "Represents the Polygon (Matic) network"
  MATIC
  "Represents the xDai network"
  XDAI
}

"Description for enum type: ProtocolType"
enum ProtocolType {
  "Represents a protocol type related to cryptocurrency exchanges."
  EXCHANGE
  "Represents a protocol type related to lending services."
  LENDING
  "Represents a protocol type related to yield generation."
  YIELD
  "Represents a protocol type related to bridging different blockchains."
  BRIDGE
  "Represents a protocol type related to options trading."
  OPTION
  "Represents a protocol type related to perpetual contracts."
  PERPETUAL
  "Represents a generic protocol type not specified by other categories."
  GENERIC
}

"Description for table: Token"
type Token @entity @regularPolling {
  "Unique identifier for the token, stored as bytes."
  id: Bytes!
  "The name of the token."
  name: String!
  "The symbol representing the token."
  symbol: String!
  "The number of decimal places used by the token."
  decimals: Int!
  "The last recorded price of the token in USD."
  lastPriceUSD: BigDecimal
  "The block number at which the last price was recorded."
  lastPriceBlockNumber: BigInt
  "Indicates if the token's data was set by an event."
  _setByEvent: Boolean
}

"Description for enum type: RewardTokenType"
enum RewardTokenType {
  "Represents a reward token type for deposit actions"
  DEPOSIT
  "Represents a reward token type for borrow actions"
  BORROW
  "Represents a reward token type for stake actions"
  STAKE
}

"Description for table: RewardToken"
type RewardToken @entity(immutable: true) @regularPolling {
  "Unique identifier for the reward token, represented as a byte array."
  id: Bytes!
  "Reference to the associated token entity."
  token: Token!
  "Categorization of the reward token type."
  type: RewardTokenType!
}

"Description for enum type: LiquidityPoolFeeType"
enum LiquidityPoolFeeType {
  "A fixed fee applied to trading transactions."
  FIXED_TRADING_FEE
  "A tiered fee structure applied to trading transactions."
  TIERED_TRADING_FEE
  "A dynamic fee applied to trading transactions based on certain conditions."
  DYNAMIC_TRADING_FEE
  "A fixed fee applied to liquidity providers."
  FIXED_LP_FEE
  "A dynamic fee applied to liquidity providers based on certain conditions."
  DYNAMIC_LP_FEE
  "A fixed fee applied by the protocol."
  FIXED_PROTOCOL_FEE
  "A dynamic fee applied by the protocol based on certain conditions."
  DYNAMIC_PROTOCOL_FEE
  "A fixed fee applied to staking activities."
  FIXED_STAKE_FEE
  "A dynamic fee applied to staking activities based on certain conditions."
  DYNAMIC_STAKE_FEE
  "A fee applied when depositing funds."
  DEPOSIT_FEE
  "A fee applied when withdrawing funds."
  WITHDRAWAL_FEE
}

"Description for table: LiquidityPoolFee"
type LiquidityPoolFee @entity @regularPolling {
  "Unique identifier for the liquidity pool fee, stored as bytes."
  id: Bytes!
  "The percentage of the fee applied to the liquidity pool, represented as a decimal."
  feePercentage: BigDecimal
  "The type of fee applied to the liquidity pool, defined by the LiquidityPoolFeeType enumeration."
  feeType: LiquidityPoolFeeType!
}

"Description for column: LiquidityPoolFee"
interface Protocol {
  "Unique identifier for the protocol"
  id: Bytes!
  "Name of the protocol"
  name: String!
  "Slug or short name for the protocol"
  slug: String!

  schemaVersion: String!

  subgraphVersion: String!

  methodologyVersion: String!

  network: Network!

  type: ProtocolType!
  "Total value locked in USD"
  totalValueLockedUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative revenue from the supply side in USD"
  cumulativeSupplySideRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative revenue from the protocol side in USD"
  cumulativeProtocolSideRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative revenue from the stake side in USD"
  cumulativeStakeSideRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!

  cumulativeTotalRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!

  "Cumulative withdraw premium in USD"

  cumulativeTotalLiquidityPremiumUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative number of unique users"
  cumulativeUniqueUsers: Int!
  "Cumulative number of unique borrowers"
  cumulativeUniqueBorrowers: Int!
  "Cumulative number of unique liquidators"
  cumulativeUniqueLiquidators: Int!
  "Cumulative number of unique liquidatees"
  cumulativeUniqueLiquidatees: Int!
  "Long open interest in USD"
  longOpenInterestUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Short open interest in USD"
  shortOpenInterestUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Total open interest in USD"
  totalOpenInterestUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Count of long positions"
  longPositionCount: Int!
  "Count of short positions"
  shortPositionCount: Int!
  "Count of open positions"
  openPositionCount: Int!
  "Count of closed positions"
  closedPositionCount: Int!
  "Cumulative count of positions"
  cumulativePositionCount: Int!
  "Total number of transactions"
  transactionCount: Int!
  "Total number of deposits"

  "Total number of withdrawals"
  withdrawCount: Int!
  "Total number of borrows"
  borrowCount: Int!
  "Total number of pools"
  totalPoolCount: Int!
  "Daily usage metrics snapshots"
  dailyUsageMetrics: [UsageMetricsDailySnapshot!]! @derivedFrom(field: "protocol")
  "Hourly usage metrics snapshots"
  hourlyUsageMetrics: [UsageMetricsHourlySnapshot!]! @derivedFrom(field: "protocol")
  "Daily financial metrics snapshots"

}

"Description for table: UsageMetricsDailySnapshot"
type UsageMetricsDailySnapshot @entity(immutable: true) @dailySnapshot {
  "Unique identifier for the snapshot."
  id: Bytes!
  "Number of days since the start of the tracking period."

  "Number of users active on a daily basis."

  "Total number of unique users cumulatively."
  cumulativeUniqueUsers: Int!
  "Count of long positions opened daily."
  dailyLongPositionCount: Int!
  "Total count of long positions."
  longPositionCount: Int!
  "Count of short positions opened daily."
  dailyShortPositionCount: Int!
  "Total count of short positions."
  shortPositionCount: Int!
  "Count of open positions on a daily basis."
  dailyOpenPositionCount: Int!

  openPositionCount: Int!
  "Count of closed positions on a daily basis."
  dailyClosedPositionCount: Int!
  "Total count of closed positions."
  closedPositionCount: Int!
  "Daily cumulative count of positions."
  dailyCumulativePositionCount: Int!
  "Total cumulative count of positions."
  cumulativePositionCount: Int!
  "Number of transactions conducted daily."
  dailyTransactionCount: Int!
  "Number of deposits made daily."
  dailyDepositCount: Int!
  "Number of withdrawals made daily."
  dailyWithdrawCount: Int!
  "Number of borrow actions conducted daily."
  dailyBorrowCount: Int!
  "Number of swaps conducted daily."
  dailySwapCount: Int!
  "Number of active depositors on a daily basis."
  dailyActiveDepositors: Int!
  "Total number of unique depositors cumulatively."
  cumulativeUniqueDepositors: Int!
  "Number of active borrowers on a daily basis."
  dailyActiveBorrowers: Int!
  "Total number of unique borrowers cumulatively."
  cumulativeUniqueBorrowers: Int!
  "Number of active liquidators on a daily basis."
  dailyActiveLiquidators: Int!
  "Total number of unique liquidators cumulatively."
  cumulativeUniqueLiquidators: Int!
  "Number of active liquidatees on a daily basis."
  dailyActiveLiquidatees: Int!
  "Total number of unique liquidatees cumulatively."
  cumulativeUniqueLiquidatees: Int!
  "Amount of collateral added daily."
  dailyCollateralIn: Int!
  "Total amount of collateral added cumulatively."
  cumulativeCollateralIn: Int!
  "Amount of collateral removed daily."
  dailyCollateralOut: Int!
  "Total amount of collateral removed cumulatively."
  cumulativeCollateralOut: Int!
  "Total number of pools."
  totalPoolCount: Int!
  "Timestamp of the snapshot."

}

"Description for table: UsageMetricsHourlySnapshot"
type UsageMetricsHourlySnapshot @entity(immutable: true) @hourlySnapshot {

}

  dailyTotalOpenInterestUSD: BigDecimal!

  "Cumulative total liquidity premium in USD up to the snapshot date."
  cumulativeTotalLiquidityPremiumUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Timestamp of the snapshot."
  timestamp: BigInt!
}

"Description for table: Account"
type Account @entity @regularPolling {
  "Unique identifier for the account, represented as a byte array."

  "Total withdraw premium in USD accumulated over time."
  cumulativeWithdrawPremiumUSD: BigDecimal!

  "Count of short positions held by the account."

  "Count of positions that have been closed by the account."
  closedPositionCount: Int!
  "Total number of unique liquidatees associated with the account."
  cumulativeUniqueLiquidatees: Int!

  deposits: [Deposit!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of deposits made by the account."
  depositCount: Int!

  withdraws: [Withdraw!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of withdrawals made by the account."
  withdrawCount: Int!

  borrows: [Borrow!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of borrow transactions made by the account."
  borrowCount: Int!

  collateralIn: [CollateralIn!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")

  collateralOut: [CollateralOut!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of collateral withdrawals made by the account."

"Description for enum type: PositionSide"
enum PositionSide {

  "Represents a short position in trading, indicating a sell or borrowing of an asset."
  SHORT
}

  "Block number when the position was closed"

  "Timestamp when the position was closed"

  "Funding rate at the time the position was closed"

  leverage: BigDecimal!

  "Current collateral balance of the position in USD"
  collateralBalanceUSD: BigDecimal!

  closeBalanceUSD: BigDecimal
  "Collateral balance in USD when the position was closed"
  closeCollateralBalanceUSD: BigDecimal
  "Realized profit and loss in USD"
  realisedPnlUSD: BigDecimal

  collateralInCount: Int!
  "List of collateral withdrawals associated with the position"
  collateralOut: [CollateralOut!]! @derivedFrom(field: "position")

  collateralOutCount: Int!
  "List of liquidations associated with the position"
  liquidation: [Liquidate!] @derivedFrom(field: "position")

}

}

"Description for table: Account"
type Account @entity @regularPolling {
  "Unique identifier for the account, represented as a byte array."
  id: Bytes!
  "Total entry premium in USD accumulated over time."
  cumulativeEntryPremiumUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Total exit premium in USD accumulated over time."
  cumulativeExitPremiumUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Total premium in USD accumulated over time, including both entry and exit premiums."
  cumulativeTotalPremiumUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Total deposit premium in USD accumulated over time."
  cumulativeDepositPremiumUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Total withdraw premium in USD accumulated over time."
  cumulativeWithdrawPremiumUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Total liquidity premium in USD accumulated over time."
  cumulativeTotalLiquidityPremiumUSD: BigDecimal!
  "List of positions associated with the account, derived from the 'account' field in the Position entity."
  positions: [Position!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Count of long positions held by the account."
  longPositionCount: Int!
  "Count of short positions held by the account."
  shortPositionCount: Int!
  "Count of currently open positions held by the account."
  openPositionCount: Int!
  "Count of positions that have been closed by the account."
  closedPositionCount: Int!
  "Total number of unique liquidatees associated with the account."
  cumulativeUniqueLiquidatees: Int!
  "List of deposits made by the account, derived from the 'account' field in the Deposit entity."
  deposits: [Deposit!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of deposits made by the account."
  depositCount: Int!
  "List of withdrawals made by the account, derived from the 'account' field in the Withdraw entity."
  withdraws: [Withdraw!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of withdrawals made by the account."
  withdrawCount: Int!
  "List of borrow transactions associated with the account, derived from the 'account' field in the Borrow entity."
  borrows: [Borrow!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of borrow transactions made by the account."
  borrowCount: Int!
  "List of collateral deposits made by the account, derived from the 'account' field in the CollateralIn entity."
  collateralIn: [CollateralIn!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of collateral deposits made by the account."
  collateralInCount: Int!
  "List of collateral withdrawals made by the account, derived from the 'account' field in the CollateralOut entity."
  collateralOut: [CollateralOut!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of collateral withdrawals made by the account."
  collateralOutCount: Int!
  "List of swap transactions associated with the account, derived from the 'account' field in the Swap entity."
  swaps: [Swap!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of swap transactions made by the account."
  swapCount: Int!
  "List of liquidation actions initiated by the account, derived from the 'account' field in the Liquidate entity."
  liquidates: [Liquidate!]! @derivedFrom(field: "account")
  "Total number of liquidation actions initiated by the account."
  liquidateCount: Int!
  "List of liquidation actions where the account is the liquidatee, derived from the 'liquidatee' field in the Liquidate entity."
  liquidations: [Liquidate!]! @derivedFrom(field: "liquidatee")
  "Total number of liquidation actions where the account is the liquidatee."
  liquidationCount: Int!
}

"Description for enum type: PositionSide"
enum PositionSide {

  "Represents a short position in trading, indicating a sell or borrowing of an asset."

}

}

[{"role": "system", "content": "Your input fields are:

Your output fields are:

2. `category` (Literal[perfect, almost perfect, poor but correct, incorrect])
3. `rating` (Literal[4, 3, 2, 1])

All interactions will be structured in the following way, with the appropriate values filled in.

[[ ## database_schema ## ]]
{database_schema}

[[ ## reasoning ## ]]

[[ ## category ## ]]

[[ ## completed ## ]]

In adhering to this structure, your objective is: 
        You are a documentation quality evaluator specializing in GraphQL schemas. Your task is to assess the quality of documentation provided for a given database schema. Carefully analyze the schema's descriptions for clarity, accuracy, and completeness. Categorize the documentation into one of the following ratings based on your evaluation: 
        - perfect (4): The documentation is comprehensive and leaves no room for ambiguity in understanding the schema and its database content.
        - almost perfect (3): The documentation is clear and mostly free of ambiguity, but there is potential for further improvement.
        - poor but correct (2): The documentation is correct but lacks detail, resulting in some ambiguity. It requires enhancement to be more informative.
        - incorrect (1): The documentation contains errors or misleading information, regardless of any correct segments present. Such inaccuracies necessitate an incorrect rating.

"Description for column: LiquidityPoolHourlySnapshot"
interface Event {
  "Unique identifier for the event"
  id: Bytes!
  "Hash of the transaction"
  hash: Bytes!
  "Index of the log in the block"
  logIndex: Int!
  "Protocol associated with the event"
  protocol: DerivPerpProtocol!
  "Recipient address"
  to: Bytes!
  "Sender address"
  from: Bytes!
  "Account involved in the event"
  account: Account!
  "Block number in which the event was included"
  blockNumber: BigInt!
  "Timestamp of the event"
  timestamp: BigInt!
}

"Description for table: Deposit"
type Deposit implements Event @entity(immutable: true) @transaction {
  "Unique identifier for the deposit event"
  id: Bytes!
  "Hash of the transaction associated with the deposit"
  hash: Bytes!
  "Index of the log entry within the block"
  logIndex: Int!
  "Protocol associated with the deposit"
  protocol: DerivPerpProtocol!
  "Address receiving the deposit"
  to: Bytes!
  "Address from which the deposit is sent"
  from: Bytes!
  "Account associated with the deposit"
  account: Account!
  "Block number in which the deposit was included"
  blockNumber: BigInt!
  "Timestamp of when the deposit occurred"
  timestamp: BigInt!
  "Tokens deposited as input"
  inputTokens: [Token!]!
  "Token received as output, if any"
  outputToken: Token
  "Amounts of each input token deposited"
  inputTokenAmounts: [BigInt!]!
  "Amount of the output token received, if any"
  outputTokenAmount: BigInt
  "Value of the deposit in USD"
  amountUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Liquidity pool associated with the deposit"
  pool: LiquidityPool!
}

"Description for table: Withdraw"

  "Unique identifier for the withdrawal event"

  "Sender address of the withdrawal"
  from: Bytes!

  account: Account!

  blockNumber: BigInt!

  timestamp: BigInt!
  "List of input tokens involved in the withdrawal"
  inputTokens: [Token!]!
  "Output token received from the withdrawal, if any"
  outputToken: Token

  inputTokenAmounts: [BigInt!]!

"Description for enum type: LiquidityPoolFeeType"
enum LiquidityPoolFeeType {
  "A fixed fee applied to trading transactions."
  FIXED_TRADING_FEE
  "A tiered fee structure applied to trading transactions."
  TIERED_TRADING_FEE
  "A dynamic fee applied to trading transactions based on certain conditions."
  DYNAMIC_TRADING_FEE
  "A fixed fee applied to liquidity providers."
  FIXED_LP_FEE
  "A dynamic fee applied to liquidity providers based on certain conditions."
  DYNAMIC_LP_FEE
  "A fixed fee applied by the protocol."
  FIXED_PROTOCOL_FEE
  "A dynamic fee applied by the protocol based on certain conditions."
  DYNAMIC_PROTOCOL_FEE
  "A fixed fee applied to staking activities."
  FIXED_STAKE_FEE
  "A dynamic fee applied to staking activities based on certain conditions."
  DYNAMIC_STAKE_FEE
  "A fee applied when depositing funds."
  DEPOSIT_FEE
  "A fee applied when withdrawing funds."
  WITHDRAWAL_FEE
}
